text:
Are you using the "<https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/conversations/create-custom-channels#channel-account-connection-for-specific-accounts|simple>"/"direct way to register a channel account?

or the full on wizard/front end <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/conversations/create-custom-channels#creating-a-connection-setup-flow-for-your-custom-channel|flow>?
